name: Food And Drink 63 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is a turkey's furcula better known as?
questions.explanation:
Wishbone.

	It is part of the pectoral girdle.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a type of oyster?
questions.explanation:
Damsons.

	Damsons is a type of small plum.

questions.text: The pecan belongs to the walnut family?
questions.explanation:
True.

	It has a high fat content and is widely used in making pastries.

questions.text: In what country was the first commercial lemonade company documented?
questions.explanation:
France.

	In late 17th century Paris, the "Compagnie de Limonadiers" was a successful business.

questions.text: Which of the following do most Jainists not eat due to beliefs?
questions.explanation:
Meat.

	Jain doctrine prescribes a strictly lacto-vegetarian diet. Even small amounts of meat and eggs are not acceptable.

questions.text: What is the official beverage of Massachusetts?
questions.explanation:
Cranberry Juice.

	Established as the official beverage in 1970.

questions.text: Which is not one of the elements in sugar?
questions.explanation:
Helium.

	One example hexose sugar C6H12O6.

True.

	It is a dark skinned fruit used as a vegetable.

Bread.

	Actually a crackerlike hard baked biscuit.
